Source: appthemes/IconStyles.js

import AppTheme from './AppTheme'

let styles;

/**
 * This class defines all the icon profiles based on whether it is a night theme , zen theme or any other day theme.
 * Each icon profile defines the default color, pressed opacity , selected color which will be applied at runtime to all the icons in the app.
 */
class IconStyles {

	/**
	 * Initializes styles object with all the icon profiles.
	 */
	static initStyles() {
		var isNightTheme = AppTheme.isNightTheme();
		var isZenTheme = AppTheme.isZenTheme();
		styles = {
			IconProfile01: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().hintColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().secondaryColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5,
				selectedColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().accentColor
			},
			IconProfile02: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().hintColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile03: {
				defaultColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().accentColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile04: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().backgroundColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile05: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().hintColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().secondaryColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile06: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().hintColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor
			},
			IconProfile07: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().backgroundColor
			},
			IconProfile08: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().secondaryColor
			},
			IconProfile09: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().tertiaryColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().hintColor
			},
			IconProfile10: {
				defaultColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().accentColor
			},
			IconProfile11: {
				defaultColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile12: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().hintColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().backgroundColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile13: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().separatorColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().activeColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile14: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().accentColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile15: {
				defaultColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().backgroundColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile16: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().errorColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile17: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().errorColor
			},
			IconProfile18: {
				defaultColor: (isNightTheme || isZenTheme) ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor :AppTheme.getColorPalette().backgroundColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile19: {
				defaultColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().hintColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().secondaryColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5,
				selectedColor: isNightTheme ? AppTheme.getColorPalette().mainColor : AppTheme.getColorPalette().backgroundColor
			},
			IconProfile20: {
				defaultColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().supportive6Color,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile21: {
				defaultColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().timeSdrColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			},
			IconProfile22: {
				defaultColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().timeSdrColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5,
				selectedColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().accentColor,
			},
			IconProfile23: {
				defaultColor: AppTheme.getColorPalette().hintColor,
				pressedOpacity: 0.5
			}
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Returns styles object which contains all the icon profiles.
	 */
	static getStyles() {
		return styles;
	}
}

export default IconStyles;
